Text: Got any more info? Bard's Tale shouldn't be 7+ gig.
Looks like an uncompressed copy of the contents of the dvd. The compressed cd image is 6 GB, so it's probably not too far off. However I wonder of this thing works.
That is really huge file for just 1 game. Why cant ppl just make ISO file (or some else image file) of the game and post that?
